venues.name: Lavo Nightclub
venues.cool_factor: GoGo Dancers & great speaker and light system

venues.name: 1Oak
venues.cool_factor: Celebrity HotSpot, 2 dance levels, mostly rap, hiphop

venues.name: Marquee NY
venues.cool_factor: 3 dance levels, decked out light system, full LCD wall

venues.name: Webster Hall
venues.cool_factor: New York's historial building houses 4 dance floors each with its own stage

venues.name: Harbor NYC Rooftop
venues.cool_factor: Retractable glass roof, party by the view overlooking the Hudson River

venues.name: Good Room
venues.cool_factor: 3 dance rooms with epic sounds and epic lighting with 2 dj booths and one stage

venues.name: House of YES
venues.cool_factor: Werid. Wild. Not like the rest! Instead of just GoGo dancers, they have circus or theather acts which is cool within itself!

venues.name: Brooklyn Hangar
venues.cool_factor: That highceiling vibe when the lights hits ya.

venues.name: Brooklyn Mirage AKA Avant Gardner
venues.cool_factor: Open courtyard feature wtih network of catwalks with an iconic city skyline
